description: This file defines the SupabaseService class which provides an interface for interacting with the 'notes' table in a Supabase backend. It includes methods for initializing the connection, fetching all notes, creating a new note, updating an existing note, and deleting a note.

classes.name: SupabaseService
classes.description: A singleton class providing methods to interact with the 'notes' table in the Supabase backend, including initializing the connection, CRUD operations for notes, and managing connection state.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the Supabase client with environment variables; throws exception if variables are missing.

methods.name: fetchAllNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes from the database, ordered by 'updated_at' descending.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note record in the database and returns the created Note object.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note record in the database and returns the updated Note object.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note record from the database by ID.
